      public boolean newGame()
      Generates new game depending on mode
      Returns:
      True when operation is succeeded, false when HangmanException is cought

    • play

      public int play()
      Main method of game what carries gui and game algorythm managment
      Returns:
      [0] When failiture, [1] When victory

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method to be executed when program starts
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments args[0] - Mode: [0] Read bank from file, [1] Read bank from user input args[1] - PlayerName: Name of the player in first round args[2] - MaxErrors: Maximum number of errors to be made in first round args[3] - FilePath: Path of file to read words (only when Mode = 0)
